nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Thorns I\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Grants a \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"50% \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"chance to\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"rebound \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"3% \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"of damage dealt\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"back at the attacker.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I-III: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Enchantment Table,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Cactus Collection\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Armor\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
